follower_of_3.name: Follower of the 3-Faced God
follower_of_3.description:
Welcome to the Duvocation. You are a Follower of the 3-Faced God.

As a dedicated follower of the god of three faces, you have been given three blessings with which to share his glory. You can pass on these boons to other individuals at night, though they are not strong on their own.

Three times during the game you can endow another player with restraint (roleblock), vigor (influence), or security (protection).

Win condition:
- You win with all threats to the Town eliminated.
follower_of_3.secondary-description:
Welcome to the Duvocation. You are are a Follower of the 3-Faced God.

Three times at night you can bless another player with restraint (roleblock), vigor (influence), or security (protection). However, your boons are too weak for effect on their own.

Win condition:
- You win with all threats to the Town eliminated.

follower_of_the_skeptic_god.name: Follower of the Skeptic God
follower_of_the_skeptic_god.description:
Welcome to the Duvocation. You are a Follower of the Skeptic God.

You have come to the Duvocation not to advocate a policy or further any cause, but merely to investigate. Unconvinced of the existence of gods, you wish to determine for yourself the truth of the issue. Your also hear someone killed the “God of Humans”, which sounds bad for you as a human, so maybe you’ll investigate that while you’re at it.

Every night you may inspect an individual, and determine their identity.

Win condition: 
- You win with all threats to the Town eliminated.
follower_of_the_skeptic_god.secondary-description:
Welcome to the Duvocation. You are a Follower of the Skeptic God.

Every night you may inspect an individual, and determine their identity.

Win condition: 
- You win with all threats to the Town eliminated.

follower_of_the_truth_god.name: Follower of the Truth God
follower_of_the_truth_god.description:
Welcome to the Duvocation. You are a Follower of the Truth God.

The truth is, truth is subjective. What is a truth to one person is an untruth to another. Therefore, that truth is, in truth, the only truth you can find and the only truth you can work to find, the subjective truth depending on the bearer of that truth’s perspective!

On odd nights you may choose someone to work for. On the following night, that individual will choose who you inspect, and you will find their alignment.

Win condition:
- You win with all threats to the Town eliminated.
follower_of_the_truth_god.secondary-description:
Welcome to the Duvocation. You are a Follower of the Truth God.

On odd nights you may choose someone to work for. On the following night, that individual will choose who you inspect, and you will find their alignment.

follower_of_the_god_of_prosperity.name: Follower of the God of Prosperity
follower_of_the_god_of_prosperity.banner: Follower of the God of Prosperity.png
follower_of_the_god_of_prosperity.description:
Welcome to the Duvocation. You are a Follower of the Prosperity God.

You follow the god of your choice for obvious reasons: altruism, generosity, believing in the good nature of people. Everyone should have the chance to flourish and grow, and help others on that same journey. So you do your best to follow that ideal and protect others from misfortune.

You make good luck charms. You currently have 5, and would make one during each day but the Arbiter God will not allow you to be distracted during the trials. You can give them out to individuals at night, and the charms will protect from a harmful action.

Win condition: 
- You win with all threats to the Town eliminated.
follower_of_the_god_of_prosperity.secondary-description:
Welcome to the Duvocation. You are a Follower of the God of Prosperity.

You have a hobby of making good luck charms. You currently have 5, and would make one during each day but the Arbiter God will not allow you to be distracted during the trials. You can give them out to individuals at night, and the charms will protect from a harmful action.

Win condition: 
- You win with all threats to the Town eliminated.

god_of_war.name: God of War
god_of_war.description:
Welcome to the Duvocation. You are the God of War.

You’ve been very involved in human affairs for the last couple hundreds of years, so much so that you didn’t even come to the last Duvocation. But this one you had a good feeling about, and as it turns out your feeling was right, as the first war involving gods for a long time looks to be breaking out. It’ll be fun to kill gods instead of only humans for a bit.

Once per game you can override the lynch and end the day by killing a person yourself.

Win condition:
- You win with all threats to the Town eliminated.
god_of_war.secondary-description:
Welcome to the Duvocation. You are the God of War.

Once per game you can override the lynch and end the day by choosing to kill a person yourself.

Win condition: 
- You win with all threats to the Town eliminated.

god_of_revenge.name: God of Revenge
god_of_revenge.description:
Welcome to the Duvocation. You are the God of Revenge.

Every bad deed deserves another. Your brand of justice may be offbeat to some, but no one can claim it isn’t fair. It is still looked down on enough you mostly keep to yourself, only giving your help to others upon request.

Three times per game you can prepare for an attack. If such an event occurs you will release a strong burst of energy upon your death, killing all visitors.

Win condition: 
- You win with all threats to the Town eliminated.
god_of_revenge.secondary-description:
Welcome to the Duvocation. You are the God of Revenge.

Three times per game you can prepare for an attack. If such an event occurs you will release a strong burst of energy upon your death, killing all visitors.

Win condition: 
- You win with all threats to the Town eliminated.

god_of_beasts.name: God of Beasts
god_of_beasts.description:
Welcome to the Duvocation. You are the God of Beasts.

There are many animals and you do care for them all, but your specialty is the especially ferocious ones. Speciality does not mean mastery though, as you refuse to fully domesticate them out of their natural wild state. You do still have more influence over them and can guide or restrain them, though too much restraining will make them follow your directions less.

Every night you can imbue a beast with power and direct it to attack a player. The first night there will be a 20% chance of failure, and that will rise 10% every night you do not feed your beasts.

Win condition: 
- You win with all threats to the Town eliminated.
god_of_beasts.secondary-description:
Welcome to the Duvocation. You are the God of Beasts.

Every night you can imbue a beast with power and direct it to attack a player. The first night there will be a 20% chance of failure, and that will rise 10% every night you do not feed your beasts.

Win condition: 
- You win with all threats to the Town eliminated.

god_of_doors.name: God of Doors
god_of_doors.description:
Welcome to the Duvocation. You are the God of Doors.

A sentinel who sees much, but who is often sidelined. Much more of the world revolves around doors than people realize, and that is your domain. You specialize in knowing connections and relations between people, but what you see can be used for many a purpose.

Every night you can choose an individual, and watch both their door and what doors they go through. You will get one result for who they visited, and one result of who visited them. You will not know which is which.

Win condition: 
- You win with all threats to the Town eliminated.
god_of_doors.secondary-description:
Welcome to the Duvocation. You are the God of Doors.

Every night you can choose an individual, and watch both their door and what doors they go through. You will get one result for who they visited, and one result of who visited them. You will not know which is which.

Win condition: 
- You win with all threats to the Town eliminated.

god_of_lies.name: God of Lies
god_of_lies.description:
Welcome to the Duvocation. You are the God of Lies.

Seeing light without dark will blind anyone, and render all sight useless. In the same way, hearing only truth dulls the senses and makes the mind worthless. You keep that balance, and sharpen people’s minds and instincts by your actions.

Once per day (or twice per day if the watchful eye of the Arbiter God is gone) you can forge a vote by another player. It will appear like, and be, a normal vote but it cannot be changed or overridden unless you retract your false vote.

Win condition: 
- You win with all threats to the Town eliminated.
god_of_lies.secondary-description:
Welcome to the Duvocation. You are the God of Lies.

Once per day (or twice per day if the watchful eye of the Arbiter God is gone) you can forge a vote by another player. It will appear like, and be, a normal vote but it cannot be changed or overridden unless you retract your false vote.

Win condition:
- You win with all threats to the Town eliminated.

unknown_god.description:
Welcome to the Duvocation. You are an unknown god.

You were imprisoned many years ago before the earth was created, and in that time lost your body as well as any knowledge of your previous identity. Deranged after being released in secret from your prison, you are determined to kill or overthrow all those who opposed you or disagree with your now extreme views.

You have no form, and as a result all non-lethal actions used directly on you will be nulled, giving no result and having no outcome.

Win condition: 
- You win with control over the Duvocation in the form of at least 50% of the votes.
unknown_god.secondary-description:
Welcome to the Duvocation. You are an unknown god.

You have no defined form, so any non-lethal action used directly on you will be nulled, giving no result and having no outcome.

Win condition: 
- You win with control over the Duvocation in the form of at least 50% of the votes.

twin_love_god.name: God of Passion
twin_love_god.description:
Welcome to the Duvocation. You are the God of Passion.

The god of passion, ruled by passion. There has long since been an established system for the gods and humans to follow, but it has always lacked the intensity of emotion you so value. When you came across the usurpers with their mania for their goals you could not help but admire them some, and helping them has in turn made your desires stronger as they once were.

Your passion towards your partners is overwhelming. If one of you or the God of Lust dies, the other will too. Additionally, you or your lover can share that passion once per game and cause two players to fall in love with the same caveat.

Win condition: 
- You win with control over the Duvocation in the form of at least 50% of the votes.
twin_love_god.secondary-description:
Welcome to the Duvocation. You are the God of Passion.

Your passion towards your partners is overwhelming. If one of you or the God of Passion dies, the other will too. Once per game you or the God of Passion can choose two individuals, and if those individuals are alive in the morning, they will fall in love, committing suicide if the other dies.

Win condition:
- You win with control over the Duvocation in the form of at least 50% of the votes.

twin_love_god.name: God of Lust
twin_love_god.description:
Welcome to the Duvocation. You are the God of Lust.

The latest of the God of Passion’s partners, you were mostly dragged in by association. You don’t mind too much however, politics are not your area of interest. That’s mostly the pelvic region. 

If one of you or the God of Passion dies, the other will too. Once per game you or the God of Passion can choose two individuals, and if those individuals are alive in the morning, they will fall in love, committing suicide if the other dies.

Win condition: 
- You win with control over the Duvocation in the form of at least 50% of the votes.
twin_love_god.secondary-description:
Welcome to the Duvocation. You are the God of Lust.

If one of you or the God of Passion dies, the other will too. Once per game you or the God of Passion can choose two individuals, and if those individuals are alive in the morning, they will fall in love, committing suicide if the other dies.

Win condition:
- You win with control over the Duvocation in the form of at least 50% of the votes.

4_faced_god.name: 4-Faced God
4_faced_god.description:
Welcome to the Duvocation. You are the 4-Faced God.

You are the true mastermind behind this incident. For hundreds of years you have passed yourself off as a benevolent god, gathering many followers under the guise of the 3-Faced God. But your ambition for praise and attention has only grown, and you began to scheme to overtake control of both humans and the gods.

You have a wide variety of curses, of which you can use one per night: 2x security (protect), 2x vigor (influence), 2x restraint (roleblock), 1x damnation (strong kill).
You also can keep tabs on your followers, divining their numbers and the status of the blessings you have given them at the start of each night. However since they are now being used in opposition of you, you will randomly visit a follower and revoke one of their remaining blessing at the end of each night.

Win condition:
- You win with control over the Duvocation in the form of at least 50% of the votes.

mafia_follower_of_the_chaos_god.name: Mafia Follower of the Chaos God
mafia_follower_of_the_chaos_god.banner: Mafia Follower of the Chaos God.png
mafia_follower_of_the_chaos_god.description:
Welcome to the Duvocation. You are a Follower of Chaos God.

Chaos chaos! There’s too much order in the current system of gods and humans, so how about we destroy that system! You likely won’t stay loyal to whoever fills the power gap but you’re not one to worry about complex plans or the future.

Every night you can exert your power, forcing any actions from an individual to target who you choose.

Win condition:
- You win with control over the Duvocation in the form of at least 50% of the votes.
mafia_follower_of_the_chaos_god.secondary-description:
Welcome to the Duvocation. You are a Follower of Chaos God.

Every night you can exert your power, forcing any actions from an individual to target who you choose.

Win condition: 
- You win with control over the Duvocation in the form of at least 50% of the votes.

follower_of_the_chaos_god.name: Follower of the Chaos God
follower_of_the_chaos_god.description:
Welcome to the Duvocation. You are a Follower of the Chaos God

Regardless of the outcome of this little squabble, it’s a perfect time for you to slip around mostly unnoticed. There’s plenty of chaos already, and you’re certainly going to add more.

You have no abilities for the time being, but will gain a nightkill when the Arbiter God is disposed of.

Win condition: 
- Your goal is to get rid of the Arbiter God’s stabilizing presence, and then kill two players.
follower_of_the_chaos_god.secondary-description:
Welcome to the Duvocation. You are a Follower of the Chaos God.

You have no abilities for the time being, but will gain a nightkill when the Arbiter God is disposed of.

Win condition: 
- Your goal is to get rid of the Arbiter God’s stabilizing presence, and then kill two players.

demigod_apple.name: Demigod of Apple Juice
demigod_apple.description:
Welcome to the Duvocation. You are the Demigod of Apple Juice.

You have come to the Duvocation not for policy discussion or political intrigue, but instead you came determined to spread the magnificence of apple juice. Your main roadblock has always been your mortal enemy, the Demigod of Orange Juice, but you know apple juice is the better drink. If you share it with others, they will surely agree, and spread the word to everyone they know! 

Every day you cheerfully prepare a master glass of apple juice, delivering it to someone at night. Being the best glass of juice to exist, they are convinced to support you and your juice. Additionally, if the Arbiter God is disposed of, you have the time to make one extra glass and deliver it to someone during the day.

Win condition: 
- Have more apple juice supporters alive at the end of the game than orange juice supporters.
demigod_apple.secondary-description:
Welcome to the Duvocation. You are the Demigod of Apple Juice.

Every day you cheerfully prepare a master glass of apple juice, delivering it to someone at night. Being the best glass of juice to exist, they are convinced to help support you and your juice. Additionally, if the Arbiter God is disposed of, you have the time to make one extra glass and deliver it to someone during the day.

Win condition: 
- Have more apple juice supporters alive at the end of the game than orange juice supporters.

demigod_orange.name: Demigod of Orange Juice
demigod_orange.description:
Welcome to the Duvocation. You are the Demigod of Orange Juice.

Orange juice has always been more popular than apple juice, largely due to your marketing abilities. However, one of your corporate spies recently told you the Demigod of Apple Juice was planning to appeal directly to the influencers at this Duvocation, and you don’t plan to get complacent and let them take the edge.

Every day you have a master glass of orange juice made, and each night you can have it delivered to an individual. It is the best glass of juice in the world, and so the deliveree will support your fare. Additionally, if the Arbiter God is disposed of, you have the time to make one extra glass and deliver it to someone during the day.

Win condition: 
- Have more orange juice supporters alive at the end of the game than apple juice supporters.

Welcome to the Duvocation. You are the Demigod of Orange Juice.

It is the best glass of juice in the world, and so the deliveree will support your fare. Additionally, if the Arbiter God is disposed of, you have the time to make one extra glass and deliver it to someone during the day.

Win condition:
